comment: The Alexander Subbase Theorem: If ` B ` is a subbase for the topology ` J ` , and any cover taken from ` B ` has a finite subcover, then the generated topology is compact. This proof uses the ultrafilter lemma; see ~ alexsubALT for a proof using Zorn's lemma. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 24-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
